details.description:
Jamie is Head of Trafford Council’s Innovation and Intelligence Lab –a team established to get the most value out of data. Working with data from across the whole of the data spectrum, Jamie and his team help people understand and solve problems, make better decisions, or evidence need, using a combination of statistical analyses, interactive visualisations and storytelling.

Jamie will be talking at the ODI Summit 2016 on 'How to Design for Open Government and Enterprise'.

<< Back to ODI Summit 2016 main page
